servicesGrid.title: Over 30 years of excellence in Fire Engineering
paragraphs: SMH SYSTEMS operates throughout Brazil with its own team and international certifications, offering complete solutions for fire prevention and protection.
We protect lives, data, assets, and connectivity ‚Äî ensuring business continuity even in critical situations.
Experts in mission-critical environments and special risks, we serve leaders in telecom, data centers, finance, industry, and construction sectors.
We provide design, certified equipment, installation, maintenance, technical support, and gas refilling.

systems.title: Fire Systems
systems.subtitle: Explore our systems designed to ensure safety, efficiency, and reliability in fire prevention and protection.

fireDetection.title: Electronic Fire Detection and Alarm Systems
fireDetection.description: Advanced technologies for early fire detection and immediate alerts.
fireDetection.details: These systems allow continuous monitoring and integration with intelligent alarm panels, ensuring quick and efficient responses in case of fire.
items: Conventional and addressable fire detection system

gaseousAgents.title: Fire Suppression with Gaseous Agents
gaseousAgents.description: Clean and effective solutions for sensitive areas and electronic equipment.
gaseousAgents.details: They allow rapid extinguishing without damaging electronic equipment, ideal for server rooms and laboratories.
items: Clean agent fire suppression system (FM200, NOVEC 1230, CO‚ÇÇ)

hydraulicSystems.title: Hydraulic Fire Suppression Systems
hydraulicSystems.description: Robust structures that ensure water supply in emergencies.
hydraulicSystems.details: Includes high-pressure pumps, hydrants, and reservoir systems sized for any building type.

sprinklers.title: Automatic Sprinkler Systems
sprinklers.description: Quickly reduce flame spread and minimize structural damage.
sprinklers.details: Wet, dry, pre-action, and deluge types with integrated electronic monitoring.

gasDetection.title: Gas and Smoke Detection Systems
gasDetection.description: Accurate monitoring for environments at risk of flammable or toxic gases.
gasDetection.details: Includes fixed and portable detectors integrated with alarm and centralized supervision systems.
items: Fixed system for toxic and flammable gases detection

passiveProtection.title: Passive Fire Protection Systems
passiveProtection.description: Preventive barriers that contain fire and smoke.
passiveProtection.details: Includes fireproof doors, walls, coatings, and compartmentalization to limit fire spread.
